newsitem.title: UK: Brammer 10-wk results up, warns on growth.
newsitem.headline: Brammer 10-wk results up, warns on growth.

text.p: British industrial services group Brammer Plc said on Tuesday that results in the first 10 weeks of this year were ahead of the year-earlier period but market conditions were worsening.

"We are finding market conditions more difficult than a year ago. In Britain, industrial activity is less buoyant than the economy and in mainland Europe, particularly in France and Germany, economies are suffering as their governments strive to meet the EMU convergence criteria," Brammer said in a statement.
Brammer said it expected growth this year but at a slower rate than the last three years.
